bug.author: knorthover
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
V0.52 fails with "AssertionError: Key "s3.requireLoginToView" is not defined." on any Streamlit command. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Upgrade from Streamlit 0.51.0 and type the following at a command prompt: <denchmark-code> > streamlit config show </denchmark-code>
(other streamlit commands such as "run" have the same behavior) <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Should display the config settings <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
|17> streamlit config show Traceback (most recent call last): File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\runpy.py", line 193, in run_module_as_main "main", mod_spec) File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\runpy.py", line 85, in run_code exec(code, run_globals) File "C:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\Scripts\streamlit.exe_main.py", line 4, in File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit_init.py", line 121, in from streamlit.DeltaGenerator import DeltaGenerator as _DeltaGenerator File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\DeltaGenerator.py", line 33, in from streamlit import caching File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\caching.py", line 38, in from streamlit.hashing import CodeHasher File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\hashing.py", line 36, in from streamlit.folder_black_list import FolderBlackList File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\folder_black_list.py", line 39, in if config.get_option('global.developmentMode'): File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\config.py", line 94, in get_option parse_config_file() File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\config.py", line 856, in parse_config_file _update_config_with_toml(file_contents, filename) File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\config.py", line 786, in _update_config_with_toml where_defined, File "c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\streamlit\config.py", line 763, in _set_option assert key in _config_options, 'Key "%s" is not defined.' % key AssertionError: Key "s3.requireLoginToView" is not defined. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.52.0
Python version: Python 3.7.3
Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? Miniconda for base environment, everything else installed with pip
OS version: Windows 10
Browser version: Chrome 79.0.3945.88 (Official Build) (64-bit)
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
I have dropped back to 0.51.0, everything is working fine.

comments.comment:
This is a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/886>#886</denchmark-link> . From that bug:
The s3.requireLoginToView option was a vestigial config option from over a year ago, and it didn't actually work anymore, so we removed it. The error you're seeing is because you have s3.requireLoginToView defined in your config.toml, and Streamlit is complaining that it's not a real config option (anymore). So the solution is to remove it from your config file.
OK. Removed all AWS configs just to be safe.
